RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.SqlString: select gc.GroupName as 'Traffic Group', tg.GroupName as 'Traffic Subgroup', sum(TxFrameCount) as 'Tx Count (Frames)', coalesce(sum(RxFrameCount),0) as 'Rx Count (Frames)', (case when (coalesce(sum(TxExpectedRxFrameCount), 0) - coalesce(sum(RxFrameCount), 0)) < 0 then '' else coalesce(sum(TxExpectedRxFrameCount), 0) - coalesce(sum(RxFrameCount), 0) end) as 'Tx-Rx (Frames)', (case when (coalesce(sum(TxExpectedRxFrameCount), 0) - coalesce(sum(RxFrameCount), 0)) < 0 then '' else round(cast(coalesce(sum(TxExpectedRxFrameCount), 0) - coalesce(sum(RxFrameCount), 0) as double) * 100.0 / coalesce(sum(TxExpectedRxFrameCount), 1), 5) end) as 'Tx-Rx (%)', coalesce(RxDroppedFrameCount,0) as 'Dropped Frame Count', round(cast(coalesce(RxDroppedFrameCount, 0) as double) * 100.0 / coalesce(TxExpectedRxFrameCount,1), 5) as 'Dropped Frame (%)', sum(TxOctetCount * 8) as 'Tx Count (bits)', coalesce(sum(RxOctetCount * 8),0) as 'Rx Count (bits)', sum(TxL1BitCount) as 'Tx L1 Count (bits)', coalesce(sum(RxL1BitCount),0) as 'Rx L1 Count (bits)', coalesce(round(cast(sum(RxTotalLatency) / 100.0 as double) / sum(RxSigFrameCount), 3), 0.0) as 'Avg Latency(us)', coalesce(min(RxMinLatency), 0.0) as 'Min Latency', coalesce(max(RxMaxLatency), 0.0) as 'Max Latency', coalesce(sum(RxInSeqFrameCount), 0) as 'In Sequence Count (Frames)', coalesce(sum(RxOutSeqFrameCount), 0) as 'Out Of Sequence Count (Frames)', sum(TxCellCount) as 'Tx Count (Cells)', coalesce(sum(RxCellCount),0) as 'Rx Count (Cells)' from GroupCollection as gc, TrafficGroup as tg, RelationTable as rt, (select TxParentStreamBlock, sum(TxFrameCount) as TxFrameCount, sum(TxOctetCount) as TxOctetCount, sum(TxL1BitCount) as TxL1BitCount, sum(TxCellCount) as TxCellCount, sum(ExpectedRxFrameCount) as TxExpectedRxFrameCount, DataSetId from (select * from TxRxEotStreamResults group by DataSetId, TxStreamId) group by DataSetId, TxParentStreamBlock) as TxSumTable left join (select TxParentStreamBlock as RxTxParentSBHnd, sum(FrameCount) as RxFrameCount, sum(OctetCount) as RxOctetCount, sum(L1BitCount) as RxL1BitCount, min(MinLatency) as RxMinLatency, max(MaxLatency) as RxMaxLatency, sum(InSeqFrameCount) as RxInSeqFrameCount, sum(OutSeqFrameCount) as RxOutSeqFrameCount, sum(TotalLatency) as RxTotalLatency, sum(SigFrameCount) as RxSigFrameCount, sum(CellCount) as RxCellCount, sum(DroppedFrameCount) as RxDroppedFrameCount from TxRxEotStreamResults where IsExpectedPort = 1 group by DataSetId, TxParentStreamBlock) as RxSumTable on TxParentStreamBlock = RxTxParentSBHnd where rt.DataSetId = @DataSetId and rt.Type = 'AffiliationTrafficGroup' and rt.SourceHnd = tg.Handle and rt.TargetHnd = TxParentStreamBlock and tg.ParentHnd = gc.Handle and tg.DataSetId = @DataSetId and gc.DataSetId = @DataSetId group by gc.Handle, tg.Handle
RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.CountQuery: select count (*) from (select gc.Handle from GroupCollection as gc, TrafficGroup as tg, RelationTable as rt, TxRxEotStreamResults where rt.DataSetId = @DataSetId and rt.Type = 'AffiliationTrafficGroup' and rt.SourceHnd = tg.Handle and rt.TargetHnd = TxParentStreamBlock and tg.ParentHnd = gc.Handle and tg.DataSetId = @DataSetId and gc.DataSetId = @DataSetId group by gc.Handle, tg.Handle)
RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.Name: RealTimeResultGroupDefinition 10
